QuestData.Title: The Altar of Naias
QuestData.Description: The salt you brought was sufficient to activate the bracers' innate enchantments. I have taken these enchantments and combined them into a summoning token... a gift, if you will.$b$bReturn to the Isle of Naias, and place the gift on Naias' altar. Call me again once you have Naias' heart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Gift of Naias to summon Naias, then obtain the Heart of Naias.
QuestData.RewardText: My colleagues within the Kirin Tor will be happy to learn that the heart is ours.$b$bThank you for your assistance, $n. I couldn't have done it without you.
